sentences.en: " I can only understand what I can visualise, " he told Luria.
sentences.cn: 他告诉卢里亚说: “ 我只能理解我能使之形象化的东西. ”

sentences.en: Though he described the place carefully, I couldn't visualise it because it was so different from anything I'd known.
sentences.cn: 虽然他把那个地方说得非常详细, 但我还是想象不出那是什么样子,因为它同我所熟悉的任何地方都完全不同.

sentences.en: To help visualise their impact, the application places a virtual garden in the user's profile.
sentences.cn: 帮助想象他们的影响, 申请学位的虚拟花园,在用户的个人资料.

sentences.en: We all can visualise a friend's face when he is away.
sentences.cn: 朋友离去后我们都能想起他的面容.

trans.tran_cn: 使可见， 使具体化，设想， 想象
